title: MEC Intra College Programming Contest 2025
description: Annual programming competition open to all MEC students. Compete in algorithmic problem-solving and coding challenges.

title: Hands-on Artificial Intelligence
description: Learn the fundamentals of robotics, build your first robot, and explore sensors, actuators, and programming.

title: ICPC Preliminary Contest 2025
description: The official ICPC online preliminary round hosted in the MEC Image Processing Lab for participating teams.

title: Git & GitHub Workshop 2024
description: A beginner-friendly workshop on version control using Git, collaboration workflows, and GitHub essentials.

title: Team Forming Contest 2025
description: A contest designed to form strong ICPC teams by testing coordination, speed, and problem-solving skills.

title: AI & Machine Learning Seminar 2024
description: A seminar covering the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence, modern ML applications, and emerging research directions.

title: MEC Hackathon 2024
description: A 24-hour hackathon where students build innovative software and hardware solutions to real-world problems.

title: MEC Intra College Programming Contest 2024
description: A competitive programming contest for MEC students focusing on problem-solving skills and coding efficiency.

title: How to Start Research Workshop
description: An introductory workshop on research methodology, literature review, problem selection, and academic writing.

title: oneAPI Unleashed: Your First Step
description: A seminar introducing Intel oneAPI, parallel programming concepts, and cross-architecture development.
